subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Hossa and Henrik Zetterberg scored two goals each, and the Detroit Red Wings routed the Chicago Blackhawks, taking a 3-1 lead in the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Marian Hossa and Henrik Zetterberg scored two goals each, and the Detroit Red Wings routed the Chicago Blackhawks, taking a 3-1 lead in the Western Conference finals.
